name: smartyjs
description: a pure HTML + JS interactive learning solution

scripts.min:js: cd js && uglifyjs smarty.js -m -c -o smarty.min.js --source-map smarty.min.js.map; cd ../
scripts.min:css: cd css && uglifycss smarty.css > smarty.min.css; cd ../
scripts.min: npm run min:js && npm run min:css
scripts.build: npm run comp && npm run min
scripts.mark: npm run mark:dir && npm run mark:watch

author: Lauren Hamel
